languages.text: "Прекрасно понимаю Вашу Светлость! Кому нужны незадачливые спутники? Но с другой стороны, если вы вернете господина Антара в свиту, это укрепит ваш союз с Арбитес". {n}Янрис прокашливается.{/n} "Насколько я знаю, маршал весьма ценит своего бывшего проктора, да и будь он действительно виновен, его бы казнили. Кажется, это некий деликатный случай, как те, что вы разбирали во Дворце Правосудия. Проявите участие, и Арбитес будут доверять вам как и прежде".

"I understand perfectly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What good is a blundering companion? But, on the other hand, accepting Master Anthar back into your retinue would strengthen your alliance with the Arbites." {n}Janris clears his throat.{/n} "To the best of my knowledge, the Marshal values his former Proctor a great deal. Besides, if Master Anthar really were guilty, he would have been executed. It would appear that some sensitive matter is involved here, in the same vein as the cases brought before you at the Palace of Justice. If you show your concern and sympathy, the Arbites will trust you as they did before."
languages.original_text: "Прекрасно понимаю Вашу Светлость! Кому нужны незадачливые спутники? languages.text: 「もちろん承知しております、殿下！使えない同行者など何の役にも立ちませんからね！ですが一方で、マスター・アンサールを再び従者に迎え入れれば、高等裁定局の同盟関係は強化されることでしょう」{n}ジャンリスは咳払いをした。{/n}「私の知る限り、将帥はかつての代理人である彼を非常に高く評価しています。それに、本当にマスター・アンサールに罪があったのであれば、処刑されていたはずです。どうやら、今回の件には、かつてあなたが司法宮で取り扱われた案件と同じような、繊細な事情が絡んでいるように思われます。あなたが関心と同情を示せば、高等裁定局は以前のようにあなたを信頼するはずです」
languages.original_text: "I understand perfectly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What good is a blundering companion? But, on the other hand, accepting Master Anthar back into your retinue would strengthen your alliance with the Arbites." {n}Janris clears his throat.{/n} "To the best of my knowledge, the Marshal values his former Proctor a great deal. Besides, if Master Anthar really were guilty, he would have been executed. It would appear that some sensitive matter is involved here, in the same vein as the cases brought before you at the Palace of Justice. If you show your concern and sympathy, the Arbites will trust you as they did before."

languages.text: "Çok iyi anlıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sürekli sorun çıkaran bir yoldaş ne işe yarar ki? Ancak şunu da belirtmeliyim ki Üstat Anthar'ı tekrar maiyetinize kabul etmek, Arbites'le olan ittifakınızı sağlamlaştıracaktır." {n}Janris boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "Bildiğim kadarıyla Miralay, eski Üsteğmen'ine fazlasıyla değer veriyor. Hem Üstat Anthar gerçekten suçlu olsaydı çoktan idam edilirdi. Görünen o ki burada, tıpkı Adalet Sarayı'nda önünüze sunulanlar gibi hassas bir mesele söz konusu. Eğer bu konuya ilginizi ve sempatinizi gösterecek olursanız eminim ki Arbites size geçmişteki gibi güvenecektir.
languages.original_text: "I understand perfectly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What good is a blundering companion? But, on the other hand, accepting Master Anthar back into your retinue would strengthen your alliance with the Arbites." {n}Janris clears his throat.{/n} "To the best of my knowledge, the Marshal values his former Proctor a great deal. Besides, if Master Anthar really were guilty, he would have been executed. It would appear that some sensitive matter is involved here, in the same vein as the cases brought before you at the Palace of Justice. If you show your concern and sympathy, the Arbites will trust you as they did before."

traits.locale_text: "Çok iyi anlıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sürekli sorun çıkaran bir yoldaş ne işe yarar ki? Ancak şunu da belirtmeliyim ki Üstat Anthar'ı tekrar maiyetinize kabul etmek, Arbites'le olan ittifakınızı sağlamlaştıracaktır." {n}Janris boğazını temizler.{/n} "Bildiğim kadarıyla Miralay, eski Üsteğmen'ine fazlasıyla değer veriyor. Hem Üstat Anthar gerçekten suçlu olsaydı çoktan idam edilmiş olurdu. Görünen o ki burada, tıpkı Adalet Sarayı'nda önünüze sunulanlar gibi hassas bir mesele söz konusu. Eğer bu konuya ilginizi ve sempatinizi gösterecek olursanız eminim ki Arbites size geçmişteki gibi güvenecektir.

languages.text: «¡Lo entiendo perfectamente, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¿De qué sirve un compañero metepatas? Por otra parte, devolver al maestro Anthar a su séquito reforzaría su alianza con el Arbites». {n}Janris carraspea.{/n} «Por lo que tengo entendido, el Mariscal valora mucho a su anterior Procurador. Además, si el maestro Anthar fuese realmente culpable de algo, habría sido ejecutado. Aquí hay algún asunto delicado de por medio, similar a los que trata usted en el Palacio de la Justicia. Si les muestra su preocupación y apoyo, el Arbites confiará en usted como hasta ahora».
languages.original_text: "I understand perfectly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What good is a blundering companion? But, on the other hand, accepting Master Anthar back into your retinue would strengthen your alliance with the Arbites." {n}Janris clears his throat.{/n} "To the best of my knowledge, the Marshal values his former Proctor a great deal. Besides, if Master Anthar really were guilty, he would have been executed. It would appear that some sensitive matter is involved here, in the same vein as the cases brought before you at the Palace of Justice. If you show your concern and sympathy, the Arbites will trust you as they did before."

Si les muestra su preocupación y apoyo, el Arbites confiará en usted como hasta ahora».

languages.text: “我完全理解您的决定，大人！那个笨手笨脚的家伙哪里能派上什么用场？但话说回来，如果您允许安萨大师回到您的队伍之中，这会加强王朝与法务部之间的盟约。”{n}詹里斯清了清嗓子。{/n}“据我所知，元帅本人非常看重这位被免职的监察官。而且，假如安萨大师真的犯了罪，那他早就被处决了。这件事情似乎牵扯到了某些敏感的问题，正如您之前在正义大殿里处理的那些棘手的案件一样。如果您能对这件事情表达关心、同情的态度，那法务部肯定会像之前一样信任您。”
languages.original_text: "I understand perfectly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What good is a blundering companion? But, on the other hand, accepting Master Anthar back into your retinue would strengthen your alliance with the Arbites." {n}Janris clears his throat.{/n} "To the best of my knowledge, the Marshal values his former Proctor a great deal. Besides, if Master Anthar really were guilty, he would have been executed. It would appear that some sensitive matter is involved here, in the same vein as the cases brought before you at the Palace of Justice. If you show your concern and sympathy, the Arbites will trust you as they did before."

languages.text: « Je comprends parfaitement, Votre Seigneurie. À quoi bon garder à vos côtés un compagnon incompétent ? Pour autant, en acceptant de réintégrer maître Anthar dans votre équipage, vous renforceriez votre alliance avec l'Arbites. » {n}Janris s'éclaircit la gorge.{/n} « J'ai cru comprendre que le maréchal tenait son ancien proctor en haute estime. Et puis, si les accusations qui pèsent contre lui étaient avérées, il aurait déjà été exécuté. Il me semble que tout cela cache quelque affaire délicate, dans la même veine que celles qui vous ont été soumises au palais de justice. Si vous faites preuve de sollicitude et de compassion, l'Arbites vous renouvellera sa confiance. »
languages.original_text: "I understand perfectly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What good is a blundering companion? But, on the other hand, accepting Master Anthar back into your retinue would strengthen your alliance with the Arbites." {n}Janris clears his throat.{/n} "To the best of my knowledge, the Marshal values his former Proctor a great deal. Besides, if Master Anthar really were guilty, he would have been executed. It would appear that some sensitive matter is involved here, in the same vein as the cases brought before you at the Palace of Justice. If you show your concern and sympathy, the Arbites will trust you as they did before."

Pour autant, en acceptant de réintégrer maître Anthar dans votre équipage, vous renforceriez votre alliance avec l'Arbites. » {n}Janris s'éclaircit la gorge.{/n} « J'ai cru comprendre que le maréchal tenait son ancien proctor en haute estime. Et puis, si les accusations qui pèsent contre lui étaient avérées, il aurait déjà été exécuté. Si vous faites preuve de sollicitude et de compassion, l'Arbites vous renouvellera sa confiance. »

languages.text: "Ich verstehe Euch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Was nützt schon ein tölpelhafter Gefährte? Andererseits würde Meister Anthars Rückkehr in Euer Gefolge Eure Allianz mit dem Adeptus Arbites stärken." {n}Janris räuspert sich.{/n} "Meines Wissens schätzt der Marschall seinen einstigen Proktor sehr. Abgesehen davon ... wäre Meister Anthar tatsächlich schuldig, hätte man ihn exekutiert. Mir scheint, hier geht es um eine heikle Angelegenheit, ähnlich wie in den Fällen, die im Justizpalast an Euch herangetragen wurden. Wenn Ihr Eurer Sorge und Sympathie Ausdruck verleiht, werden Euch die Arbites wie damals vertrauen."
languages.original_text: "I understand perfectly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What good is a blundering companion? But, on the other hand, accepting Master Anthar back into your retinue would strengthen your alliance with the Arbites." {n}Janris clears his throat.{/n} "To the best of my knowledge, the Marshal values his former Proctor a great deal.
